descriptionHtml:
EDIT: keep in mind that this is all very limited due to not having a creation kit, I will expand greatly on this project when it is released.



Thank you for downloading \"Who Is Dovahkiin?\" Mod, please endorse!
V0.1

-----------------

INFO: A mod that lets you start the game with a new perspective. With 15 possible
starts!

Starts you at \"Bilegulch Mine\" on 14 saves.

Starts in \"The Ratway\" on the beggar save.

You are started with some items and perks that go along with your class.

on 14 of the saves you ARE aligned with bandits.

There is a hardcore save, which is pretty much a basic character with no edits and only ragged clothes.

The beggar save is a hardcore save where you start in the ratway, and have nothing but your clothes, a dagger, and one gold coin, how rich can you become?

The point:

skips the main quest, and makes you a \'bandit\' so you can get a new perspective on the game.

WARNING: do not forgot to type the \'bat (archetype)\" command, so you can be allied with bandits and have all your settings available to you!
-----------------

Installation:

follow the folders until you reach your selected text file.
copy the WID.ess in your Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves folder.
Put the text file in your Skyrim\\ Directory.
Start skyrim, load your selected save.
type: bat (selected class here) Replace \"(selected Class Here)\" with your selected class.
Save.
Have fun!

-----------------

By: McMuffinMarauder
Please Endorse!
author: McMuffinMarauder
